      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_99539</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99539</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réfraction de lumière voyageant de l'eau dans du verre</string>
            <string language="en">Refraction of light travelling from water into glass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung des Lichtes reisend vom Wasser in Glas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction da luz que viaja da água no vidro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione di luce che viaggia dall'acqua nel 
vetro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση του φωτός που ταξιδεύει από το ύδωρ στο 
γυαλί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción de la luz que viaja del agua en el 
cristal</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que, quand la lumière  passe de l'eau dans du verre, elle est réfractée vers la  normale quand elle approche la limite sous un angle et n'est pas  réfractée du tout quand elle se déplace le long de la normale.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that, when light passes from water into glass, it is refracted towards the normal when it approaches the boundary at an angle and is not refracted at all when it travels along the normal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">flexion</string>
            <string language="en">bending</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">limites</string>
            <string language="en">boundaries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">verre</string>
            <string language="en">glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayons de lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">normale</string>
            <string language="en">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn Licht vom 
Wasser in Glas überschreitet, sie in Richtung zum Normal refracted, 
wenn sie der Grenze sich schräg nähert und nicht an allen refracted,
wenn sie entlang den Normal reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que, quando a luz passa 
da água no vidro, refracted para o normal quando aproxima o limite em
um ângulo e não refracted em tudo quando viaja ao longo do normal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che, quando la luce 
passa da acqua in vetro, refracted verso il normale quando si avvicina
al contorno ad angolo e non refracted affatto quando viaggia lungo il 
normale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι, όταν διαθλιούνται τα 
ελαφριά περάσματα από το ύδωρ στο γυαλί, αυτό προς τον κανονικό
όταν πλησιάζει το όριο διαγωνίως και δεν διαθλιούνται καθόλου 
όλων όταν ταξιδεύει κατά μήκος του κανονικού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que, cuando la luz pasa
del agua en el cristal, está refractada hacia el normal cuando 
acerca al límite en ángulo y no refractada en todos cuando viaja a 
lo largo del normal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
